title: Introduction to HTML
description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML structure, semantic elements, and document organization

title: CSS Styling and Layout
description: Master CSS selectors, properties, flexbox, and grid for responsive layouts

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Understand variables, functions, events, and DOM manipulation with JavaScript

title: Python Basics for Data Science
description: Essential Python programming concepts and data structures for data analysis

title: Data Analysis with Pandas
description: Learn to manipulate and analyze datasets using the pandas library

title: Design Thinking Process
description: Understanding user needs through empathy, ideation, and prototyping

title: UI Design Fundamentals
description: Typography, color theory, spacing, and visual hierarchy in interface design
